name: Quiche
text: I put in a ton of spinach! The crust from this recipe is quite flaky and delicious.

name: Taro Ball Desert
text: It wasn't quite as good as Meet Fresh but it was pretty close.

name: Butternut Squash Pasta
text: This was pretty yummy. I had soo much leftover I ate it for like 4 days.

name: Shakshuka
text: Made with my roommates for a potluck dinner.

name: Spinach Pie (Spanakopita)
text: The phyllo dough was very yummy. It was kind of tedious to make though.

name: Brown Butter Matcha Brownies
text: I love matcha flavor and this was like a whole pan of it

name: Scallion Rolls
text: Bread rolls with scallions. It was a yummy savory treat.

name: Blueberry Bars
text: I was inspired by an auntie from my hometown who made these all the time. I also made some whipped cream infused with earl grey tea to top it off.

name: Mango Crepe
text: The best part of this was the fresh mango.

name: Eggplant Stir-Fry
text: My attempt at re-creating that spicy restaurant flavor haha
recipeText:
Ingredients: 
- dried wood ear mushrooms (木耳)
- ground turkey or pork
- ginger
- scallions
- soy sauce
- black vinegar
- shaoxing wine (optional)
- white pepper (optional)

Steps:
1. Soak dried wood ears in water for at least 20 minutes, then wash and drain
2. Heat oil in pan, add ginger
3. Cook ground meat with soy sauce, salt, white pepper
4. Add wood ears, black vinegar, shaoxing wine
5. Add scallions

name: Jello Cookies
text: This is a recipe I found for sugar cookies flavored with jell-o because we had a bunch of jello in the apartment that we didn't know what to do with. The jello colors reminded us of pokemeon so we tried to make a Bulbasaur shaped cookie.

name: Matcha Swirl Pound Cake
text: I couldn't get the swirl to be perfect, but it was very delicious and buttery.

name: Peanut Mochi
text: So sticky and difficult to wrap these T-T

name: Wood Ear Mushroom Stir-fry
recipeText:
Ingredients: 
- dried wood ear mushrooms (木耳)
- ground turkey or pork
- ginger
- scallions
- soy sauce
- black vinegar
- shaoxing wine (optional)
- white pepper (optional)

Steps:

2. Heat oil in pan, add ginger
3. Cook ground meat with soy sauce, salt, white pepper
4. Add wood ears, black vinegar, shaoxing wine
5. Add scallions

name: Shin Ramen
text: The packaged stuff, with added goodies :)
recipeText: Just shin ramyun with added onions, scallions, sesame seeds and seaweed snack for added goodness.

name: Tomato Egg Stir-Fry
recipeText:
Ingredients:
 - tomatoes
 - eggs
 - ginger
 - scallion
 - cheese slice (optional)
 - soy sauce
 - salt
 
 Instructions:
 1. Chop tomatoes into chunks
 2. Scramble eggs, add salt
 3. Heat ginger in oil in pan
 4. Add tomatoes, salt, soy sauce, cook until softened
 5. Add scrambled eggs and scallion, cook until eggs are set
 6. Add cheese slice on top if desired.
